import React from 'react' import { useDispatch, useSelector } from 'react-redux' import { Link, useLocation, useNavigate } from 'react-router-dom' import { Navbar, Nav, Container, Row, NavDropdown } from 'react-bootstrap' import { LinkContainer } from 'react-router-bootstrap' import { logout } from '../actions/userActions' function Header() { const userLogin = useSelector(state => state.userLogin) const { userInfo } = userLogin const navigate = useNavigate() const dispatch = useDispatch() const logoutHandler = () => { dispatch(logout()) navigate('/login') } return (
ProShop
Cart {userInfo ? ( Profile Logout ) : ( Login )} {userInfo && userInfo.isAdmin && ( Users Products orderlist )}
) } export default Header
